interface.name: ebox
interface.description: ebox installs instances of E programs. Each program runs with access, by default, only to its own instance directory. The code is separate; managed by Zero Install.

interface.name: ebox-chat
interface.description: EBox-Chat is a demonstration chat client. It allows secure two-way text-based communication with another instance of itself. It is designed to be installed using the ebox demonstration sandboxing system.

interface.name: ebox-help
interface.description: This library can be used by programs to display simple help text. It is part of the EBox sandbox proof-of-concept examples.

interface.name: edit
interface.description: This is a very simple proof-of-concept text editor that can be confined using the EBox sandbox system.
